headline: A Look At Chubb (CB) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Fresh Analyst Upgrades
summary: Chubb (CB) has attracted fresh attention after its latest quarter, reporting revenue of $16.14b and earnings per share above analyst expectations, along with guidance that points to continued growth and a series of analyst upgrades. See our latest analysis for Chubb. At a recent share price of US$306.81, Chubb’s short term share price return has cooled slightly after its post earnings jump. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of 20.63% and 5 year total shareholder return of 113.57%...
